author: Reuters Editorial
title: Russia's Novak plans to discuss U.S. withdrawal from Iran deal with Saudi Falih
text:
MOSCOW (Reuters) - Russia’s Acting Energy Minister Alexander Novak said on Monday he planned to discuss the U.S. withdrawal from the Iran nuclear deal with Saudi Energy Minister Khalid al-Falih when they meet at an economic forum in St. Petersburg later this month.
FILE PHOTO: Russian Energy Minister Alexander Novak attends the Gas Exporting Countries Forum Summit in Santa Cruz, Bolivia November 23, 2017. REUTERS/David Mercado/File Photo Novak told reporters global oil prices are currently under the influence of geopolitics but “fundamentally the market is balancing out”.
Reporting by Denis Pinchuk; Writing by Andrey Ostroukh; Editing by Paul Tait
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
